waitlist.title: Join the Waitlist
waitlist.description: Be the first to know when PicBox launches. Transform your iPad into a stunning digital photo frame with cinematic Ken Burns effects and smart face detection.

showcase.title: Digital Photo Frame for iPad & Apple TV
showcase.description: PicBox transforms your iPad and Apple TV into beautiful digital photo frames. Features cinematic Ken Burns effects, smart face detection, and seamless photo library integration.

brand.name: PicBox
brand.tagline: The photo frame your screens were meant to be.

footer.tagline: The photo frame your screens were meant to be.
